inclusion.criterion: Confirmed large pericardial effusion on echocardiography (i.e., echo free space ≥1 cm anterior to the right ventricle of the heart in diastole)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to participate for the full duration of the trial (i.e., 12 months)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of a contra-indication to the administration of a fibrinolytic agent (i.e., major haemorrhage or major trauma; coincidental stroke; major surgery in the previous 5 days; blood pressure >200/100 mmHg)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Burkitt's lymphoma with a large pericardial effusion, but no involvement of the central nervous system or bone marrow. A cardiac MRI showed a mass in the right atrium adjacent to the AV junction.
